about_the_game:
ABOUT THE CHARACTER AND STORY

You are Sasha, a person who has lost both their memory and family. Thrust into a world torn apart by chaos and violence, your sole mission is to find your loved ones and save them. However, you soon realize that you are caught in a much larger and more dangerous fight for survival, one that will decide not only your fate but the fate of all humanity.

STORY

After waking up on the riverbank in an unfamiliar place, Sasha remembers nothing. Upon meeting a mysterious stranger, he learns that his family has been taken by marauders, and his wife has left for another town in search of help. This marks the beginning of a dangerous and mysterious journey, where at every turn, enemies, secrets, and unexpected allies await you.

You will face a dark and dangerous world where humans are not your only foes. In a world where resources are worth their weight in gold, you’ll need to forge alliances, fight brutal battles, and make difficult decisions that will alter your path. Delve into ominous hospitals, encounter marauders, and evade zombies while searching for vital supplies. Each encounter could be your last, and every decision has consequences.

GAME FEATURES

    [] Non-linear story: Your choices determine not only the fate of the main character but the future of entire communities.[] Dark open world: Explore abandoned cities, post-apocalyptic forests, and hidden laboratories where dangers lurk around every corner.[] Intense atmosphere: Every step could be your last—be prepared to face marauders, zombies, and other threats.[] Deep crafting and survival system: Gather resources, craft weapons, and gear that will aid your survival.
  • Multiple endings: Uncover one of several possible endings, each determined by your decisions and actions throughout the game.

Your path is filled with danger, but only you can decide whether you will survive in this brutal world and save those you hold dear.
